Hero.title: Fullstack Sofware Engineer
Hero.subtitle: Available for work
Hero.description: Hello, I'm Juan ! I hold a Master's degree from the HETIC IT school and have 3 years of experience working on startups as a Fullstack Software Engineer. I am looking to join a dynamic, agile and humane team that will match my ambitious and persevering mindset ! Participating in exciting projects, learning new technologies, and thriving with my coworkers is what I desire.

ProjectsSection.title: Projects
ProjectsSection.description: Explore a collection of personal projects crafted to deepen my expertise, experiment with new technologies, and bring creative ideas to life.

firstItem.title: Chat App
firstItem.description: A chat application allowing users to create rooms and chat with each other in real time.

secondItem.title: Project Management App
secondItem.description: An application that allows teams to manage their projects and tasks, using Kanban boards, tables and timelines.

thirdItem.title: Expenses Tracker
thirdItem.description: An application that allows users to track their expenses and incomes and visualize them in a chart.

ExperienceSection.title: Experiences
ExperienceSection.description: With 3 years experience in fullstack software engineering, I have contributed to building scalable web applications, integrating modern technologies, and delivering impactful solutions.

StackSection.title: Technologies
StackSection.description: These are the technologies I use to build your ideas.
